headline: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (BR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. on Value investing subreddit by Key_Variety_6287. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BR. Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc.’s share was trading at $195.96 as of January 29th. BR’s trailing and forward P/E were 25.06 and 20.83 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
